onset.Description: Onset time of the first stimulus

duration.Description: Duration of trial from beginning of first stimulus to end of fixation

trial_type.Description: Category of trial based on stimuli characteristics

accuracy.Description: Indicates if participant made correct or incorrect response

response_time.Description: Subject response time measrured from beginning of presentation of second stimulus

A_stim.Description: Name of one of words presented in trial located in stimuli/

B_stim.Description: Name of one of words presented in trial located in stimuli/
